com.adyen.core.models

Class Amount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.core.models.Amount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Amount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Representation of an amount. Contains the value in minor units (e.g. 200 for $2) and the String representation of the currency.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
